name: Future Search
description:
FutureSearch is a next-generation search tool designed to give you quick, accurate, and distraction-free results. Unlike traditional search engines, FutureSearch focuses on speed, simplicity, and privacy — helping you find what you need without endless ads or clutter.

✨ Features:

🔍 Fast & reliable search across the web

🧠 AI-powered results for smarter answers

🎯 Minimal, ad-free interface for distraction-free browsing

🔒 Privacy first — no tracking or data selling

🌐 Works on mobile, tablet, and desktop


Whether you’re looking for information, resources, or quick answers, FutureSearch makes it simple and efficient.
